title: go.talks/present: printing slides
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. open a slideshow
2. print

What is the expected output? nicely formatted slides

What do you see instead? it doesn't correctly paginate/position the slides

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)? not relevant to go code

Which browser are you using? Chrome

Which version are you using?  go1.0.3

I made a print stylesheet that seems to work; the slides in go.talks seem to look fine.
This stylesheet doesn't work in FF because it ignores page-break suggestions.
Attachments: 1. print.css (874 bytes)
